law.catch_line: In this subtitle, "mutual association" means an association that:...
law.text:
In this subtitle, "mutual association" means an association that:
Is a corporation chartered under the laws of the State as a savings and loan association that does not have the authority to issue capital stock;
Is insured by the State of Maryland Deposit Insurance Corporation; and
Has assets of $15,000,000 or less or had total assets of less than $15,000,000 as of May 18, 1985.
